name: Huan Chen
body:
### Bio
I am a 4th year undergraduate majoring in Telecommunication Engineering from [Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications](http://english.bupt.edu.cn/) (BUPT). My research interests include data mining, network science and machine learning. Currently, I have come to the final stage of my undergraduate’s dissertation entitled **Research on Overlapping Community Detection in Complex Networks** advised by Prof. [Yajing Xu](http://www.pris.net.cn/en/introduction-en/teacher-en/yajingxu) and will be an exchange student to [Polytechnic University of Valencia](https://www.upv.es/index-en.html) (UPV), Valencia, Spain in 2015 spring semester.

I am looking for a PhD position in the field of computer science starting from 2015 Fall. Here is my CV.

### Education
##### Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunication (BUPT), Beijing, China
B.E., Telecommunication Engineering, Sept. 2011 - Jul. 2015(expected)
 * GPA: 89.2/100, Major GPA: 90/100, Rank: 11/592
 * TOEFL: 106 (R27 + L26 + S26 + W27), GRE: V149 + Q169 + AW3.5
 * Courses
  * Models and Algorithms for Social Network Analysis 92
  * Database Technologies and Applications 90
  * Data Structures 90
  * Advanced Mathematics I 99
  * Advanced Mathematics A II 91
  * Linear Algebra 94
  * Probability Theory and Stochastic Processes 93

##### Polytechnic University of Valencia (UPV), Valencia, Spain
Exchange Student, Telecommunication Engineering, Jan. 2015 - Jul. 2015(expected)

### Research Experience
#### [Pattern Recognition and Intelligent System Lab](http://www.pris.net.cn/) (PRIS), BUPT
Advisor: Prof. [Yajing Xu](http://www.pris.net.cn/en/introduction-en/teacher-en/yajingxu), Jul. 2014 - present

**Overlapping Community Detection (Early undergraduate thesis project)**
* Extracted paired CALL and SMS records from a large mobile network (2 million users, 1 billion entries), analyzed the topological properties such as including degree distribution, edge weights (frequency of CALL and SMS) and similarities between users.
* Studied and implemented some classic and the state of art algorithms employed in overlapping community detection in complex networks such as Newman’s Fast Algorithm, CPM, K-Clique, K-Core, K-dense. 
* Revised and parallellized a density based LINK Algorithm with OpenMP to detect overlapping communities and find and visualize kernels structure in the network.

#### Knowledge Engineering Group, Tsinghua University

Advisor: Prof. [Jie Tang](http://keg.cs.tsinghua.edu.cn/jietang/)   Jul. 2014 - Aug. 2014

**Predicting Health Care Risk**
* Preprocessed and analyzed the online records of patients to predict fatty liver by Weka with classifier model Logistic Regression, J48, Naive Bayes.
* Studied the underlying relationships of age, sex, employment departments and disease rate.

#### Multimedia Communication and Pattern Recognition Lab, BUPT
Advisor Prof. Bo Yang, Apr. 2014 - Jun. 2014

**Reading Recognition of Pointer Instrument**
* Designed and Implemented an effective approach to recognize the temperature and humidity reading of a hygrothermographn from a given photo of a dial.
* Employed image processing techniques such as hough line transform, binarization, pixel filtering by adjusting thresholds to locate both pointers and centers, scale and map the measuring range and calculate the readings.

#### Network System Architecture and Convergence Lab, BUPT
Advisor: Prof. Zehua Gao, May. 2013 - Apr. 2014

**Family-oriented IoT Travel Platform**
* Established a database and login module with PHP for a House-Exchanging Travel platform.
* designed a wireless network with ZigBee nodes for smart home to moniter temperature, humidity and gas status and detect intrusion.

### Publications
Honghao Wei, Yang Yang, **Huan Chen**, Bin Xu, Jian Li and Miao Jiang. **Predicting Health Care Risk With Big Data**. Accepted by  3rd National Conference of Social Media Processing (_SMP_), 2014.

### Honors and Awards
* 1st Prize in National College Mathematical Contest, Beijing Region (top 1%), 2012
* 2nd Prize in National English Contest for College Students (top 1.5%), 2012
* Honorable Winner in Mathematical Contest in Modeling, 2014
* 2nd Prize in Physical Experiment Contest, BUPT, 2013

### Skills
C++, C, MATLAB, JAVA, Python, Excel VBA, LaTeX.
